item.title: 里海石油管道运营商报告俄罗斯办事处遭无人机破坏
item.description: 负责哈萨克斯坦大部分原油通过俄罗斯出口到黑海的里海管道财团称，其位于新罗西斯克的办事处在一次无人机袭击中受损。【原文：The Caspian Pipeline Consortium, which handles most of Kazakhstan’s crude exports through Russia to the Black Sea, said its office in Novorossiysk was damaged in a drone strike.】

item.title: 破产企业 Northvolt 受托人称董事会不太可能承担责任
item.description: 倒闭的瑞典电池制造商 Northvolt AB 旗下一家公司的受托人表示，要求董事会董事个人承担责任的依据不足，尽管供应商提出的约 68 亿克朗（约合 7.2 亿美元）索赔仍未支付。【原文：The trustee for a unit of failed Swedish battery maker Northvolt AB said there is little basis to hold board directors personally liable, even as supplier claims of about 6.8 billion kronor ($720 million) remain unpaid.】

item.title: 安联全球首席信息官警告：人工智能可能使上市公司缩水 20
item.description: 安联全球投资公司（Allianz Global Investors）全球股票业务首席投资官表示，人工智能将迎来一个 "数字达尔文主义 "时期，这对未能适应这一时代的公司来说将是 "非常、非常残酷的"。【原文：Artificial intelligence will usher in a period of “digital Darwinism” that will be “very, very brutal” for companies that fail to adapt, according to the chief investment officer of Allianz Global Investors’ global equities business.】

item.title: 可可反弹，诱人价格吸引豆类买家
item.description: 可可期货在纽约和伦敦止跌回升，原因是商业买盘抵消了供应前景改善和欧盟森林砍伐法规可能推迟实施所带来的压力。【原文：Cocoa futures snapped declines in New York and London as commercial buying offsets pressure from better supply prospects and a possible delay to the European Union Deforestation Regulation.】

item.title: 捷克因价格风险暂缓加息，焦点转向未来之路
item.description: 捷克中央银行在第三次会议上维持利率不变，此前决策者对持续存在的通胀风险表示担忧。【原文：The Czech central bank left interest rates unchanged for a third meeting after policymakers expressed concerns over persistent inflation risks.】

item.title: Novacap 同意以 19 亿美元收购 Integral Ad Science
item.description: Novacap 同意收购 Integral Ad Science Holding Corp.，该交易对这家广告分析公司的估值约为 19 亿美元。【原文：Novacap has agreed to acquire Integral Ad Science Holding Corp. in a deal that values the advertising analytics company at about $1.9 billion.】

item.title: 甲骨文寻求通过公司债券销售融资 150 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，甲骨文公司本周三正寻求从美国投资级债券市场借款 150 亿美元。【原文：Oracle Corp. is seeking to borrow $15 billion from the US investment-grade bond market on Wednesday, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 墨西哥通胀率在墨西哥银行关键利率会议召开前有所加快
item.description: 在墨西哥央行周四做出利率决定之前，墨西哥 9 月初的年度通胀加速度基本符合预期。【原文：Mexico’s annual inflation accelerated roughly in line with expectations in early September ahead of the central bank’s Thursday interest rate decision.】

item.title: 贝森特称美国正在与阿根廷谈判 200 亿美元的交换额度
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，美国正在与阿根廷讨论 200 亿美元的互换额度，并准备购买该国的美元债券，这将为哈维尔-米莱总统在下月关键的中期选举之前 "架起一座桥梁"。【原文：The US is discussing a $20 billion swap line with Argentina and is ready to buy up the country’s dollar bonds, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said, giving President Javier Milei “a bridge” until key midterm elections next month.】

item.title: 野村的麦克利戈特说，股市欣喜若狂，应继续对冲
item.description: 野村证券国际公司（Nomura Securities International Inc.【原文：Bullish investors should keep hedging their portfolios as more and more people chase this year’s stock market rally, according to Nomura Securities International Inc. cross-asset strategist Charlie McElligott.】

item.title: OpenAI 与 SAP 合作，为德国政府带来 ChatGPT
item.description: SAP SE 将与 OpenAI 合作，为德国公共部门提供人工智能公司的服务，包括 ChatGPT。【原文：SAP SE will work with OpenAI to bring the artificial intelligence company’s services, including ChatGPT, to Germany’s public sector.】

item.title: 新西兰央行新行长布雷曼被视为宽松政策的支持者
item.description: 即将上任的新西兰储备银行行长安娜-布雷曼（Anna Breman）是一位倾向于更大胆刺激政策的决策者，据她的祖国瑞典的经济学家称。【原文：In incoming Governor Anna Breman, the Reserve Bank of New Zealand is getting a policymaker that leans toward favoring bolder stimulus, according to economists in her home country of Sweden.】

item.title: 新资本涌入，英伟达支持的 Cohere 公司估值达 70 亿美元
item.description: 随着企业竞相采用人工智能工具，加拿大科技独角兽公司Cohere Inc.获得的新投资使其估值达到约70亿美元。【原文：New investments in Canadian tech unicorn Cohere Inc. have brought its valuation to about $7 billion as businesses race to adopt artificial intelligence tools.】

item.title: 欧洲央行称现金是危机中的关键，必须保证供应
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）表示，由于现金在危机时期至关重要，中央银行和私人贷款机构必须保证人们能够获得足够的现金，并表示支持家庭预留紧急储备金的想法。【原文：Central banks and private lenders must guarantee sufficient access to cash due to its critical importance during times of crisis, the European Central Bank said, signaliing support for the idea of households setting aside an emergency reserve.】

item.title: 加州在燃料短缺威胁来临前警告天然气贸易商
item.description:
监管机构将严格审查那些在推动价格上涨的同时还持有多头头寸的人。【原文：

Regulators will scrutinize anyone who drives prices up while also holding long positions.

】

item.title: 麦格理通过加强实物交易拓展液化天然气业务
item.description: 麦格理集团（Macquarie Group Ltd.）旨在通过加强实物交易来促进其液化天然气业务的发展，这是该银行为在快速增长的市场中占据更大份额而做出的最新努力。【原文：Macquarie Group Ltd. aims to boost its liquefied natural gas business by ramping up physical trading, the latest effort by the bank to capture a larger share of the fast-growing market.】

item.title: 据说美国将寻求入股，美洲锂业公司股价大涨 70% 以上
item.description: 据报道，特朗普政府正在寻求入股美洲锂业公司（Lithium Americas Corp.【原文：Lithium Americas Corp. surged in premarket trading Wednesday following reports that the Trump administration is pursuing a stake in the company.】

item.title: 惠誉因政治不确定性将泰国前景展望降至负面
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）将泰国的信用评级展望从稳定下调至负面，理由是长期的政治不确定性和增长前景疲软给公共财政带来的风险不断上升。【原文：Fitch Ratings downgraded Thailand’s credit rating outlook to negative from stable, citing rising risks to public finances from prolonged political uncertainty and weakening growth prospects.】

item.title: 刚果钴矿商 Chemaf 将在没有投资者的情况下停止运营
item.description: 刚果民主共和国的一家铜钴矿开采商表示，如果无法获得投资者，将于 11 月停产，该矿已成为中美两国矿产交易竞争日益激烈的象征。【原文：A copper and cobalt miner in the Democratic Republic of Congo that’s become a symbol of the growing competition for mineral deals between the US and China said it will stop production in November if it can’t secure an investor.】

item.title: 沙特股市开盘，阿里巴巴带动新兴股市创四年新高
item.description: 新兴市场股票指数涨幅扩大，原因是沙特计划放宽外资持股规定，沙特股市因此反弹，而阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. ）在增加人工智能支出后股价跳涨。【原文：An equity gauge for emerging markets extended gains as Saudi stocks rallied on plans to relax the kingdom’s foreign ownership rules and Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.’s jumped after ramping up its AI spending.】

item.title: 三色公司从债券持有人账户中收回利息支付款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，一些上周收到利息付款的 Tricolor Holdings 资产支持债券持有者在最近几天看到这些资金被收回，因为这家次级汽车贷款公司的突然破产影响了相关贷款的收款。【原文：Some Tricolor Holdings asset-backed bond holders who received interest payments last week have seen those funds clawed back in recent days, according to people with knowledge of the matter, after the subprime auto lender’s abrupt bankruptcy upended collections on the underlying loans.】

item.title: 50 岁以上人群的 "顽强生命力 "证明了传奇强劲的旅行预订量
item.description: 50 岁以上老年人旅游和保险供应商 Saga Plc 表示，由于其客户群具有 "弹性"，今年下半年的远期旅游预订 "强劲"。【原文：Over 50s travel and insurance provider Saga Plc said it sees “strong” travel forward bookings for the second half of the year as its customer base proves “resilient.”】

item.title: 英国在调查欧洲机场网络攻击期间逮捕一名男子
item.description: 英国国家犯罪署在对上周末欧洲几大机场登机手续办理中断和航班延误的网络攻击进行调查期间逮捕了一名男子。【原文：The UK’s National Crime Agency has arrested a man during its investigation into a cyberattack that disrupted check-ins and delayed flights at several major European airports over the weekend.】

item.title: 安哥拉竞购德比尔斯少数股权以抵制博茨瓦纳
item.description: 安哥拉提出购买戴比尔斯公司的少数股份，试图保持世界最大钻石公司之一的独立性，此前博茨瓦纳表示正寻求控制该公司。【原文：Angola offered to buy a minority stake in De Beers in an attempt to keep one of the world’s biggest diamond companies independent, after Botswana said it’s seeking to take control of the firm.】

item.title: 美联储放宽政策，无利可图的科技股 "泡沫和风险 "反弹加剧
item.description: 对美联储将继续降息的押注推动了科技行业中风险最高的一个领域的反弹，引发了人们对股市可能出现痛苦逆转的担忧。【原文：Bets that the Federal Reserve will continue cutting interest rates have fueled a rally in one of the riskiest corners of the technology sector, raising concerns about a potential painful reversal in the stocks.】

item.title: Adnoc 的 120 亿欧元 Covestro 交易因欧盟补救措施迫在眉睫而得到推动
item.description: 阿布扎比国家石油公司（Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.）以近 120 亿欧元（约合 141 亿美元）收购德国科思创公司（Covestro AG）的交易正逐步接近欧盟的批准，据熟悉此事的人士透露，该公司与监管机构的谈判为最快于下周提交一揽子承诺铺平了道路。【原文：Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.’s nearly €12 billion ($14.1 billion) takeover of Covestro AG is edging closer to European Union approval after talks with regulators paved the way for a package of commitments to be submitted as soon as next week, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 甲骨文人工智能引发的资金紧张为大幅裁员埋下伏笔
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，布罗迪-福特（Brody Ford）将探讨甲骨文公司一跃成为人工智能工作云计算供应商的一个不利因素。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Brody Ford looks at one of the downsides of Oracle’s leap into prominence as a provider of cloud computing for artificial intelligence work.】

item.title: 中国承诺在世贸组织取消 "发展中 "地位预示着美国贸易谈判的良好前景
item.description: 我是驻香港的亚洲经济记者 Katia Dmitrieva。今天我们关注的是中国在世贸组织的态度转变。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Katia Dmitrieva, Asia economics correspondent in Hong Kong. Today we’re looking at China’s change of heart at the WTO. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 欧盟希望美国就金属关税问题做出答复
item.description: 本周，在吉隆坡举行的东盟部长级峰会期间，欧盟贸易负责人马罗斯-塞夫科维奇将会见美国贸易代表贾米森-格里尔。【原文：The European Union’s trade chief, Maros Sefcovic, will meet with US Trade Representative Jamieson Greer this week on the sidelines of the ASEAN ministerial summit in Kuala Lumpur.】

item.title: 评论近期购买 Apple Watch 的用户不会嫉妒今年的表款
item.description:
该公司最新推出的智能手表主要面向新买家和设备老化的用户。【原文：

The company’s latest smartwatches are geared toward new buyers and people with aging devices.

】
